Module ePJ2
Package ePJ2

Class InvoiceGenerator

java.lang.Object
ePJ2.InvoiceGenerator
public class InvoiceGenerator extends Object
Utility class for generating invoices, summary reports, and daily reports. This class provides methods for generating invoices, summary reports, and daily reports based on rental data, as well as methods for finding vehicles with the most loss due to faults and deserializing vehicle objects from files.

  • Method Details

    • generateInvoice

      public void generateInvoice(Rental rental)
      Generates an invoice for the provided rental and saves it to a text file.
      Parameters:
      rental - The rental for which the invoice is generated.

    • generateSummaryReport

      public static void generateSummaryReport(List<Rental> rentals, Map<String,Double> vehiclePrices)
      Generates a summary report based on the provided rentals and vehicle prices, and displays it using a Swing GUI.
      Parameters:
      rentals - The list of rentals for which to generate the summary report.
      vehiclePrices - A map containing vehicle IDs as keys and their corresponding prices as values.

    • generateDailyReports

      public static void generateDailyReports(List<Rental> rentals, Map<String,Double> vehiclePrices)
      Generates daily reports based on the provided rentals and vehicle prices, and displays them using a Swing GUI.
      Parameters:
      rentals - The list of rentals for which to generate daily reports.
      vehiclePrices - A map containing vehicle IDs as keys and their corresponding prices as values.

    • findMostLossForEachType

      public static void findMostLossForEachType(List<Rental> rentals, List<Vehicle> vehicles)
      Finds the rental with the most loss due to faults for each vehicle type, serializes the corresponding vehicle object, and saves it to a file.
      Parameters:
      rentals - The list of rentals to search for faults.
      vehicles - The list of vehicles corresponding to the rentals.

    • deserializeFiles

      public static ArrayList<Vehicle> deserializeFiles(String folderPath)
      Deserializes vehicle objects from files in the specified folder.
      Parameters:
      folderPath - The path to the folder containing the serialized vehicle files.
      Returns:
      A list of deserialized vehicle objects.

    • clearInvoiceDirectory

      public static void clearInvoiceDirectory()
      Clears the invoice directory by deleting all files inside it.
